mapper.sql: SQJL_ID, XM_ID, XMZM, XMMC, XH, XM, GENDER, YXDM, YXMC, RXN, NJ, ZYH, ZYMC, BJH, BJMC, CHPM, ZHPJ, YYSP, PHONE, EMAIL, ZZJE, JLGJDQM, XLCP, STATUS, CONFIRM_STATUS, ISCONFIRM1, ISCONFIRM2, FSYJ, SELF_PAY, VALID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from T_XM_XSSQJL
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_XM_XSSQJL where SQJL_ID = #{sqjlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID = 1
